data.title: Gala Purchase Form
data.text:
Applause 2024

Pledge Your Support for Applause 2024 Today!

Friday, November 8th | The DoubleTree by Hilton in Chesterfield

Event Co-Chairs: Judy Kent & Lori Putnam

You’re invited to join us in supporting our annual Applause Gala! Benefitting STAGES’ life-changing artistic & education programs, this year’s event is set to take us to even greater heights as we welcome an anticipated 400+ guests to our new event home at the beautiful DoubleTree by Hilton in Chesterfield.

The evening will celebrate the glitz & glamour of Broadway featuring cocktails & dinner,

silent & live auctions, STAGES Performing Arts Academy performance, our inaugural

STAGES Hall of Fame inductees, and entertainment headlined by a truly star-studded couple:

Tony Award Winner Stephanie J. Block & Sebastian Arcelus!

For more information, please contact:

Sue Reinschmidt, Special Events Manager | sreinschmidt@StagesStLouis.org | 636.449.3948

John Herget, Development Director | jherget@StagesStLouis.org | 636.449.5576

Event Sponsorship Levels

All Levels Include a Post-Gala Meet & Greet with Stephanie J. Block & Sebastian Arcelus
